ModMetaData.description:
Original mod "Rimmu-Nation - Security" by Chicken Plucker https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2011774401
Spun out and updated by XxHyde840xX, fixes by Zaljerem. MASSIVE THANKS ZAL!
Make sure to check out Zaljerem's SSM Turret revival as well, located at; https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2825346267.
Big thanks to Paradox in the RimWorld discord server for the final balance pass. The sentry turret should be just as good as you all remember, if not better.
--
The Sentry SMG Turret, spun out from "Rimmu-Nation - Security" by Chicken Plucker, located at: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2011774401. All credit to Chicken Plucker, I just yanked the turret. It sadly didn't make it to "Rimmu-Nation² - Security," and since I'm late to the party so to speak, I've done what I can so myself and others can enjoy some of CP's older stuff on the 1.4 version of RimWorld. Make sure to check out Chicken Plucker's workshop, located at: https://steamcommunity.com/id/chickenplcker/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100, as well as their awesome mod collections! The newest version of Rimmu-Nation² - Security can be found here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2563504596.
If the original author wishes at any time for me to remove this from the workshop, I will comply with their request to do so.
